programme.title: Standing Up For Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: Murders on the Cote Sauvage
programme.desc: Amidst cocaine-laden shores, the discovery of Lagne's body plunges Captain Sarah into a web of intrigue. Together with drugs agent Ben, she navigates dark secrets and treacherous alliances to unveil the truth behind the murders haunting the Côte Sauvage.

programme.title: The Human Part
programme.desc: While telling his parents and two sisters that he is a successful CEO of a large IT company, Pekka is actually bankrupt and penniless. He cons strangers for money and food. What happens when his parents show up for a surprise visit?

programme.title: Dogworld
programme.desc: In the near future, two friends dream of leaving the Italian city of Taranto, a wasteland ruled over by warring gangs and surrounded by barbed wire. Recruited by a local gang, and with a girl coming between them, their friendship is put to the test.

programme.title: A Murder Of Crows A Vigilante Justice
programme.desc: When a ransom demand suddenly appears, the disappearance of 19-year-old Tim Jatzkowski is now a cause of concern. While the boy’s father wants the police to rescue him, inspector Martin Brühl tries to convince his family to pay the ransom.

programme.title: Wajma, An Afghan Love Story
programme.desc: In conservative Kabul, young Wajma discovers she is pregnant out of wedlock. Her boyfriend denies paternity and her father locks her up for being a disgrace. Driven by desperation, Wajma takes extreme measures forcing everyone to re-think their actions.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: March 1984, a few miles off the south coast of Iceland, a fishing boat sank with all its men. One of the crew members miraculously survived. After six hours in the ocean, the exhausted man is washed ashore, only to find himself on a deadly lava field.

programme.title: Black As The Snow 3: Off Limits
programme.desc: A senior executive of a multinational company is murdered on a ski lift in the French Alps. Captain Meyer decides to investigate after learning that his ex-lover is a suspect. Accompanied by French Officer Vivier, he is determined to unravel the mystery.

programme.title: Suro
programme.desc: A young, vulnerable couple inherits a cork-harvesting farm in rural Catalonia. As newly fledged landowners, they dream of building a fair and sustainable life, only to find their ideals clash head-on with their dire need to make money.

programme.title: I Want You
programme.desc: In this achingly melancholic sequel to Three Meters Above the Sky, Mario Casas is the soulful Hache, a man trying to forget his first love, Babi. When he meets Gin, he thinks he might love again. But a chance encounter with Babi shatters it all.

programme.title: Black As The Snow
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the rampage in the ski resort of Morzine-Avoriaz. Vivier, French police officer teams up with the Swiss policeman Meyer to investigate the suspicious deaths of teenagers. They must find the killer before the victim list grows.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his company’s most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: Human Capital
programme.desc: Lake Como, Italy. A cyclist is hit off the road by a jeep in the night before Christmas Eve. What happened that night? How will this accident change the destiny of the rich Bernaschi family and the Rovelli family on the edge of bankruptcy?

programme.title: Easy Living
programme.desc: A 14-year-old kid, a young woman who smuggles medicines up and down the Italian border with France and a bizarre American tennis teacher who dreams of being a painter. Their lives take a turn when they meet an illegal migrant.
